itemList.name: Ibuprofen
itemList.description: Ibuprofen is used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation caused by many conditions such as headache, toothache, back pain, arthritis, menstrual cramps, or minor injury.

itemList.name: Paracetamol
itemList.description: Paracetamol (acetaminophen) is used to treat many conditions such as headache, muscle aches, arthritis, backache, toothaches, colds, and fevers.

itemList.name: Amoxicillin
itemList.description: Amoxicillin is used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections. This medication is a penicillin-type antibiotic.

itemList.name: Lisinopril
itemList.description: Lisinopril is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 6 years old.

itemList.name: Metformin
itemList.description: Metformin is used with a proper diet and exercise program and possibly with other medications to control high blood sugar. It is used in patients with type 2 diabetes.

itemList.name: Amlodipine
itemList.description: Amlodipine is used to treat chest pain (angina) and other conditions caused by coronary artery disease. It is also used to treat high blood pressure.

itemList.name: Simvastatin
itemList.description: Simvastatin is used along with a proper diet to help lower 'bad' cholesterol and fats (such as LDL, triglycerides) and raise 'good' cholesterol (HDL) in the blood.

itemList.name: Omeprazole
itemList.description: Omeprazole is used to treat certain stomach and esophagus problems (such as acid reflux, ulcers). It works by decreasing the amount of acid your stomach makes.

itemList.name: Losartan
itemList.description: Losartan is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and to help protect the kidneys from damage due to diabetes.

itemList.name: Albuterol
itemList.description: Albuterol is used to treat wheezing and shortness of breath caused by breathing problems (such as asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease).
